name: Ray Gun
description: Absolutely disintegrate zombies leaving no trace of their entire existence...

name: Rusty Chainsaw
description: She may not look the best but she sure does work! Great for close encounters with the infected.

name: Bottle of Mystery Liquid
description: Found this behind the shed a few days ago. Who knows what it does? Find out!

name: Hand Crank Radio
description: The most reliable way to stay up-to-date with whats going on in this wasteland.

name: Solar-Powered Flashlight
description: The power of the sun in the palm of your hands! You'll Never run out of light with this bad-boy! (sunlight required)

name: Kevlar Vest
description: Keeps you safe from bites and bullets.

name: Portable Water Filter
description: Turn nasty water into drinkable, tasty water because you do NOT wanna drink that radioactive stuff.

name: Crossbow
description: Silent and deadly, even if it is a pain to reload.

name: Survival Manual
description: Learn how to survive without needing your momma.

name: First Aid Kit
description: If you don't want to die, this is something essential for you.

name: Machete
description: Useful for cutting through both the wilderness and zombies.

name: Geiger Counter
description: Detect radiation levels to learn where you can't go and what you can't eat.

name: Gas Mask
description: Protects from toxic gases excerted by zombies and humans alike.

name: Camouflage Netting
description: Pretend you're Harry Potter as you stay hidden from enemies.

name: Handmade Grenades
description: Unregulated means uncapped potential.

name: Flare Gun
description: A bright-ass light to signal for help or scare away threats.

name: Binoculars
description: See them before they see you. Or... just look for things, I guess?

name: Portable Stove
description: Cold food is nasty. Cook on the go to keep living that semi-luxurious hot food life.

name: Duct Tape
description: It's not Flex Tape, but it fixes almost anything.

name: Survival Backpack
description: Be able to carry all your essentials.
